name: Beware of the Rude Dog
description:
Beware of the dog!

Move around with WASD keys so the dog can catch the items on the ground and stay in place.

Drop and lose an item by pressing SPACE: BONE or BALL (8 items available, random). Watch out for the cooldown!

  • BONE: 1 second, slow speed
  • BALL: 3 seconds, fast speed (watch out!)
  • STEAK: 2 seconds, moderate speed (appears automatically)

Entertain the dog until the bar in the bottom of the screen is filled.

Good luck! Run for your life!

Game developed as a part of the Wowie Jam 3.0.
